person.persName: Berry S. Young (Marion, Kentucky, County Clerk)

body.p: Marion, Kentucky, tavern keeper and county clerk. Virginia native. Married Narcissa "Nancy" Young. Father of Matilda J. Young, Nannie M. Young, Helen M. Young, and Harriet A. Young. Tavernkeeper in Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1850. County Clerk in Marion, Kentucky in 1860. Clerk for Crittenden County Court in 1864. Appointed Major and Paymaster to U.S. Volunteers in Kentucky on April 21, 1864. Resigned February 24, 1865.
